about_the_game:
The Clown's Forest 3: Haunting Apparitions is the third game in the saga of The Clown's Forest. It is also a prequel to The Clown's Forest and The Clown's Forest 2: Waking Shadows.

STORY
On a cold snowy night on December 17th 2012... Oliver Fox witnessed with downfall of Jonathan Longhurst. Oliver has discovered a deadly secret behind Jonathan's concerning behaviour and has to escape from Hartown Park before he gets caught and murdered by the murderous Blitzo the Clown.

With his father missing, and only a Torch and a Taser to aid in his escape, Oliver has to use his wits and survival instincts to avoid the Clutches of not just Blitzo, but even more deadlier foes.

Can you change Oliver's fate, or will he always be doomed to perish in the snowy depths of Hartown Park.

GAMEPLAY FEATURES
  • Puzzles - Puzzles return from the first two titles, but this time they are even more mind-bending and deadly. Use hints around the environment to proceed.

  • Highly Detailed Maps - The maps are more detailed than ever before, with exploration being encouraged!

  • Compelling Cast of Characters - Characters are written to be much more realistic than ever before!

  • Choices - Some of your choices will have consequences... Make your decisions wisely.

  • Chase Sequences - Chases are now even more thrilling with a dynamic camera system that zooms in and out depending on location.

  • Spine-Chilling Moments - Sinister sequences are made even more terrifying with atmospheric music to add to the tension.

  • Replayability - Unlock a Bonus Story and an insanely difficult gamemode after beating the main campaign!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features Pixel Art depicting flesh and blood. And also features detailed text-based death scenes.
